net.letscode.game.server.client

Class ClientSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.WebSocketAdapter
      • net.letscode.game.server.client.ClientSession
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventBusProvider, org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.WebSocketListener

    @WebSocket
public class ClientSession
extends org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.WebSocketAdapter
implements EventBusProvider
    Defines a ClientSession. A ClientSession handles the base interaction with each client session. Specifically, this entails processing incoming and outgoing messages and ensuring that they are passed to the necessary event processing classes. For specific details on how this occurs, see the RequestMonitor and the MessageDispatcher.
    Author:
    timothyb89
